content.text: Match ends, Roma 3, Bayer 04 Leverkusen 2.
Second Half ends, Roma 3, Bayer 04 Leverkusen 2.
Wojciech Szczesny (Roma) is shown the yellow card.
Offside, Bayer 04 Leverkusen. Hakan Calhanoglu tries a through ball, but Chicharito is caught offside.
Vasilis Torosidis (Roma) is shown the yellow card.
Offside, Bayer 04 Leverkusen. Julian Brandt tries a through ball, but Chicharito is caught offside.
Substitution, Bayer 04 Leverkusen. Julian Brandt replaces Admir Mehmedi.
Wendell (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Mohamed Salah (Roma).
Vasilis Torosidis (Roma) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

Foul by Juan Iturbe (Roma).
Goal!  Roma 3, Bayer 04 Leverkusen 2. Miralem Pjanic (Roma) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom left corner.
Ömer Toprak (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) is shown the red card.
Penalty conceded by Ömer Toprak (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) after a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty Roma. Mohamed Salah draws a foul in the penalty area.
Attempt saved. Daniele De Rossi (Roma) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
Attempt blocked. Edin Dzeko (Roma) right footed shot from the left side of the six yard box is blocked. Assisted by Vasilis Torosidis with a cross.
Substitution, Roma. Vasilis Torosidis replaces Maicon because of an injury.
Attempt saved. Radja Nainggolan (Roma) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Daniele De Rossi.
Foul by Chicharito (Bayer 04 Leverkusen).
Maicon (Roma) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt blocked. Maicon (Roma) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Corner,  Roma. Conceded by Kyriakos Papadopoulos.
Substitution, Bayer 04 Leverkusen. Christoph Kramer replaces Karim Bellarabi because of an injury.
Wojciech Szczesny (Roma) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Chicharito (Bayer 04 Leverkusen).
Attempt missed. Lucas Digne (Roma) left footed shot from the left side of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Miralem Pjanic.

Attempt blocked. Daniele De Rossi (Roma) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Mohamed Salah.
Substitution, Roma. Juan Iturbe replaces Gervinho.

Offside, Bayer 04 Leverkusen. Kyriakos Papadopoulos tries a through ball, but Admir Mehmedi is caught offside.
Kevin Kampl (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Dangerous play by Miralem Pjanic (Roma).
Goal!  Roma 2, Bayer 04 Leverkusen 1. Admir Mehmedi (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) right footed shot from the right side of the box to the top right corner. Assisted by Kevin Kampl.
